Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms with Direct-dial phone, Voice mail, Wake-up calls, Safe, Hairdryer on request. Room service, Laundry services, Exchange, Laundry, Lounge, Roof Garden. Public parking - 50m(Fee 2Euro), Internet corner, Elevator. Opened 1968, Renovations 2001.

Important place or monument close to the hotel: Located in the heart of the old Venetian town, near Liston, Beach - 300m, Casino - 4km. Port - 2km. Nearest station/metro: Bus station - 50m. Nearest airport: Airport - 2km.
